Articles.Content:
Hi all! Since I was playing around with StarSystems and Planet Factory CE, I thought I would give you guys a challenge for it.

Challenge Summary: Get a manned mission to another star and back in StarSystems (Star must be a reasonable distance away) using only basic chemical rocket technology.

1. StarSystems

2. Planet Factory CE (Required for Super Challenge)

1. Get into orbit around another star and return home.

2. No warp drive/jump drive/Orion mods, OP parts, or Novapunch.

3. Crew must be at least 2 Kerbals.

4. No cheating or HyperEdit (Mechjeb breaks after leaving Kerbol's SOI so don't bother)

5. Bring scientific supplies.

1. Using PFCE, create and visit at least one planet orbiting the destination star.

2. Career Mode only!

3. Visit at least one planet on the way out of the Kerbol system.

4. Bring a crew of at least 6 Kerbals.

5. Leave some kind of unmanned probe with at least one docking port behind for future missions.

Badges coming soon!

Edited July 31, 2014 by _Augustus_
